Masih Ada Tender Akhir Tahun, Jokowi: Kualitasnya Pasti Jelek
06 Nov 2019, 04:25 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyesalkan masih adanya proses tender yang dilakukan menjelang akhir tahun. Menurut dia, proses tender tersebut seharusnya bisa dilakukan di awal tahun agar realisasinya sesuai rencana.Jokowi mendapat laporan dan Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Pemerintah (LKPP) bahwa ada proses e-tendering di bulan November dengan nilai Rp 31 triliun."Tadi saya lihat Pak Roni (Kepala LKPP) menyampaikan November masih ada e-tendering Rp 31 triliun, saya tadi lihat ditepuk tangan. Jangan lah kita ulang-ulang. Ini sudah tinggal November," kata Jokowi saat membuka Rakornas Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Tahun 2019 di JCC, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Jokowi mengaku proses tender berbasis elektronik bisa dieksekusi dengan cepat, namun ada baiknya hal tersebut tidak melulu diulang setiap tahunnya. Sebab, waktunya sudah berada di ujung tahun."Meskipun e-tendering, saya tahu ada yang cepat, tiga hari, ada yang 15 hari, ada yang 45 hari, ngerti. Tapi apakah seperti ini mau kita teruskan? Rp 31 triliun," jelas dia.Jokowi khawatir jika program yang ditender pada akhir tahun merupakan pembangunan konstruksi, maka pihak kontraktor mana yang mampu menyelesaikan pembangunan dengan waktu yang singkat. Mantan Wali Kota Solo ini pun bahkan akan memberikan hadiah kepada pihak kontraktor yang mampu menyelesaikan proses pembangunan tersebut."Tapi ini urusan konstruksi. Mau manggil siapa kontraktornya. Coba maju sini, saya beri sepeda. Tinggal dua bulan masih urusan konstruksi, masih lelang konstruksi. Ini nggak bisa diterus-teruskan. Saya ngalamin semua-semuanya. Nggak mungkin lah, lepas Agustus masih urusan konstruksi. Lelang ko gimana," ujarnya.Dengan kejadian itu, Jokowi pun menyoroti mengenai kualitas dari proyek pembangunan itu sendiri."Akhirnya apa? Ya, kualitasnya pasti jelek. Jembatan ambruk, kaya gini nih, November masih tender gimana, SD ada yang ambruk, gedung, karena apa? Ini, gini ini, kerja cepet-cepetan, dan pas kerja, pas bulannya basah, bulan hujan, ya sudah, ngerti lah kita, nggak mungkin lah kita membuat konstruksi pekerjaannya pakai payung, nggak mungkin. Sudah bohong lah kaya gitu. Kesimpulannya jelas sekali Jangan seperti ini kita ulang lagi," ungkap dia.Simak Video "Pakar Nilai Alasan Jokowi Belum Keluarkan Perppu Mengada-ada"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/fdl)
text:
There's a End of Year Tender, Jokowi: The quality is definitely bad
Nov 6 2019, 04:25 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) regretted that there is still a tender process conducted towards the end of the year. According to him, the tender process should have been carried out at the beginning of the year so that the realization was according to plan. Jokowi received a report and the Government Goods / Services Procurement Policy Agency (LKPP) that there was an e-tendering process in November with a value of Rp 31 trillion. " Pak Roni (Head of LKPP) said that in November there was still e-tendering of Rp. 31 trillion, I saw applause. We should not repeat this. It was only November, "Jokowi said when opening the 2019 National Procurement / Goods Procurement Coordination Meeting at JCC, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019). Jokowi admitted that the electronic-based tender process can be executed quickly, but it's good that it is not always repeated every year. Because, the time is at the end of the year. "Even though e-tendering, I know there are fast, three days, there are 15 days, there are 45 days, understand. But if we want to continue like this? Rp 31 trillion," explained he.Jokowi is worried that if the program tendered at the end of the year is construction, then which contractor will be able to complete the construction in a short time. The former mayor of Solo will even give a gift to the contractor who is able to complete the construction process. "But this is construction. I want to call the contractor. Try to get ahead, I'll give a bicycle. Only two months are still in construction, still in construction auction. This cannot be continued. I experience it all. It is not possible, after August it is still a matter of construction. What will the auction be like, "he said. With that incident, Jokowi also highlighted the quality of the development project itself." Finally what? "The bridge is collapsing, like this, November is still a tender, how come elementary schools have collapsed, because of what? This, this, work quickly, and when I work, when it's wet, when the month is rainy, it's already been done. "Understand us, it is not possible to make construction work using umbrellas, it is impossible. It's a lie like that. The conclusion is very clear. Don't be like this again," he said.
